description.oldValue:
Visio for the web users will be able to quickly access text formatting options from the new floating menu that appears after selecting and right clicking on text in their diagram. Formatting options include changing the font, growing and shrinking the font size, changing the font color, aligning text, and changing the font style—bold, italic, or underlined. Users will also be able to cut, copy, and paste the selected text using the new menu options.
GA date: February CY2023
description.newValue: Visio for the web users will be able to quickly access text formatting options from the new floating menu that appears after selecting and right clicking on text in their diagram. Formatting options include changing the font, growing and shrinking the font size, changing the font color, aligning text, and changing the font style—bold, italic, or underlined. Users will also be able to cut, copy, and paste the selected text using the new menu options.
